author: Francisco Rodrigues, AI Boost
title: MARA Holdings Nears 50K Bitcoin Treasury Milestone
description: The company in June saw a 25% decrease in blocks won mostly due to weather-related curtailments.
content:
MARA Holdings (MARA) now holds 49,940 bitcoin 
, a trove that puts the public miner near the 50,000 threshold and makes it the second-largest publicly traded bitcoin holder behind Strategy (MSTR).At… [+890 chars]
